author: Makena Kelly
title: Influencers Get Their Final Marching Orders for the Election
description: The Trump and Harris campaigns have built huge networks of influencers and content creators. They have one last job—getting people out to vote.

author: Justine Calma
title: Apple News will let you watch election results from your lockscreen
description: On Election Day in the US, Apple News is rolling out live results to lockscreens.

author: Hannah Abraham
title: Russia claims it doesn't care who wins the US election. Its state media tells another story.
description: Kamala Harris' tendency to burst out laughing has been ridiculed on Russian state TV. Meanwhile, Donald Trump has been portrayed as confident.

author: Angela Watercutter
title: Forget Screen Time. We Need to Talk About Screen Real Estate
description: Spending many hours daily looking at screens feels like a foregone conclusion. The new challenge is paring down what fills them.

author: ldodgson@insider.com (Lindsay Dodgson)
title: Trump's election victory put TikTok's astrology community into a meltdown
description: Astrologers on TikTok, who foresaw a Harris victory, face backlash and trust issues after Trump's re-election challenged their predictions.

author: kcloonan@insider.com (Kelly Cloonan)
title: Bitcoin ETFs see highest daily outflows ever as traders brace for Election Day volatility
description: Bitcoin ETFs saw record outflows ahead of the election as the market eyes the potential for uncertainty to spark volatility for the crypto.

author: fdemott@insider.com (Filip De Mott)
title: Why JPMorgan says election gridlock will be the best-case scenario for stocks
description: An election that results in a divided Congress will help reduce uncertainty and market volatility, JPMorgan says.

author: ABC News
title: WATCH: Wrong-way driver came within feet of Harris' motorcade, officials say
description: A suspected drunken driver going the wrong way on the interstate came within feet of Vice President Kamala Harris' motorcade after a campaign stop this week in Wisconsin, a sheriff's official said.

author: fdemott@insider.com (Filip De Mott)
title: Legendary investor Paul Tudor Jones says he's buying gold and bitcoin pre-election because inflation will rise under both Trump and Harris
description: "The playbook to get out of this is that you inflate your way out," Jones said about America's ballooning national debt.

author: Grace Eliza Goodwin
title: US intel says Russian actors made the fake Georgia voter fraud video — and expects more to come
description: Russian influence actors created a fake Georgia voter fraud video, a group of US intelligence officials said.

author: Melia Russell,Rebecca Torrence,Riddhi Kanetkar,Helen Li,Samantha Stokes,Leena Rao,Alistair Barr
title: Silicon Valley is officially grieving over Trump but quietly gleeful over a possible tech deal resurgence
description: As Trump's win stirs uncertainty in Silicon Valley, tech investors weigh regulatory shifts, a changing M&A market, while pondering the future of antitrust policies under his administration.

author: Shubhangi Goel
title: BlackRock's Larry Fink says the US election 'really doesn't matter' for markets
description: The CEO leads the world's largest asset manager, which has come under scrutiny from Republicans.

author: Bryan Metzger
title: Elon Musk has spent more than $130 million on Trump and the GOP this year
description: After pouring an additional $43.6 million into his pro-Trump super PAC, Elon Musk is now the ex-president's second largest financial backer.

author: Christopher Palmeri and Hannah Miller / Bloomberg
title: Jeff Bezos Says Washington Post Withheld Endorsement to Address ‘Credibility Gap’
description: The decision set off a firestorm of criticism, internal resignations, and reportedly the cancellation of some 200,000 of the paper’s subscribers.

author: Luke Barr, Katherine Faulders, John Santucci
title: Chinese hackers believed to have targeted Trump, Vance cellphones: Sources
description: Chinese hackers believed to have targeted Trump, Vance cell phones, according to reports.

author: ABC News
title: WATCH: Florida’s 'serial killer' python population is swallowing deer, gators
description: Invasive Burmese pythons have been linked to declines in the Florida Everglades’ mammal population.

author: Julia Reinstein
title: Teen with machete arrested for voter intimidation at polling place
description: An 18-year-old was arrested outside a Florida polling location Tuesday after police said he wielded a machete in order to intimidate voters.

author: Peter Charalambous
title: Kentucky election officials push back on viral 'vote-switching' video
description: Officials in Kentucky are pushing back on unfounded allegations of voter fraud after a social media video showed an apparent technical glitch on a ballot-marking machine.

author: Alcynna Lloyd,Jordan Pandy
title: Some Americans think moving to Canada will solve all their problems. But Canada has its own issues.
description: Americans are increasingly Googling "moving to Canada" in the run-up to Election Day.

author: JILL COLVIN Associated Press
title: Trump is using election lies to lay the groundwork for challenging 2024 results
description: Donald Trump has spent months laying the groundwork to challenge the results of the 2024 election if he loses

author: John Power
title: What Joe Rogan, Washington Post dramas say about the US election and media
description: Trump and Harris have both shunned newspapers in favour of podcasts, highlighting media's struggle for relevance.

author: Devin Dwyer, Sarah Herndon
title: AI deepfakes a top concern for election officials with voting underway
description: State election officials in political battleground states say they are bracing for the unpredictable and emergent threat posed by artificial intelligence, or AI.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Chinese hackers target Trump, Vance and Harris campaign phones: US media
description: FBI is investigating alleged access to cellphone networks by people associated with Beijing.
